attributes.label: FIRE RATE
attributes.value: 5.56 rounds per second, with a 0.03-second interval between every two rounds

spell2.name: EYE OF AGAMOTTO
spell2.description: Separate nearby enemies' Souls from their bodies. Damage dealt to these Souls is transferred to their physical bodies.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast spell field that surrounds the caster

spell3.name: CLOAK OF LEVITATION
spell3.description: Ascend and then enter a brief state of sustained flight

spell4.name: MAELSTROM OF MADNESS
spell4.description: Release Dark Magic to deal damage to nearby enemies.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast spell field that surrounds the caster

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Each point of Dark Magic deals 1.2 damage.

spell5.name: PENTAGRAM OF FARALLAH
spell5.description: Open portals between two locations, enabling all units to travel through them.

spell6.name: SHIELD OF THE SERAPHIM
spell6.description: Create a protective barrier against damage.

spell7.name: PRICE OF MAGIC
spell7.description: Dark Magic accumulates with every hit on an enemy. If Dark Magic peaks for too long, Doctor Strange will be cursed with Anti-Heal.

attributes.label: ANTI
attributes.value: HEAL ACTIVATION DELAY AT PEAK DARK MAGIC -  3s
